Register Buy item Balance enquiry Add money Display Information item Enter price : price Proceed Enter item : month : Show year : Add Total balance : clear Available Bal : Daily Investment Record Daily Investment Analysis Monthly spend money spend : money received : compileSdk 34
Monthly Analysis no data Total money available : guide About 3. Users can add money which he/she has received or earn from any source. 2. Users can view their purchases, prices, and dates, even after 10 years. 4. Users can see their spending and total amount spent for any month and year. 1. Store the total available balance. 5. If a user adds an item to the app, their balance updates automatically. How to use What\'t new 2. Once user registerd successfully ,he/she can opt for login 3. There will be 4 option - Add item 13.To view your total spending for the month, check the monthly spending page 12. To view your daily investment record, go to the \'Display Information\' section, select the correct month and year, and press the \'Show\' button. This will display all your records for the selected month 1. Users must log in first. If you don\'t have an account, you can register by clicking the \'Don\'t have an account?\' option below the login form. - Balance enquiry - Monthly spend 4. Initially, the user has 0 balance in their account, so they cannot buy or add any items in the app; it will show an \'insufficient balance\' message 6. Go to the balance enquiry section and add 100 or any amount if you truly have it available in real life 8. In the monthly spend section, set the month and year correctly, then press \'Show.\' It will display the total amount of money you have received and spent for that respective month. 7. Your balance is updated , you can now check in monthly spend 10.To add item - Go to add item page, enter what item you bought and at what price, then set the month and year correctly and press commit 5. so user has to add some balance ,only if he/she has with him/her in real, if user has 100 rupee he/she should add 100 here by going to the balance enquiry page Use it happily - Display information 9. Now according to the process of adding 100 , it will show Rs.100 in received option and 0 in spend as you haven\'t buy or add any item yet. about Github - College - Contact North Eastern Regional Institute Of Science And Technology NERIST https://github.com/Jugalcody Linkedin - https://www.linkedin.com/in/jugal-kishore-das-323443234/?originalSubdomain=in Logout back button of register page Button to sign up by user Back button for forgot
